name: The Vampire's Tale
description:
It late 19th century America and unrest fills a small town to the south. A murdered woman found in her own home with signs of a vampire all around the body. There hasn't been an attack in years not since the two resident vampires moved into the old house outside of town.

Those vampires being you and your best friend Jo. Maybe in an ideal world no one would suspect either of you but this world is not ideal. 

It doesn't help that you are so hungry and the town hasn't seen the last of the attacker yet.

---

This game contains the following themes that may be distressing to some players

  • Hunting of wildlife
  • Violence towards the main character and others
  • Descriptions of blood and injury
  • Cannibalism (drinking blood) which the main character may partake in
  • Sexual jokes (nothing is explicit)
